title: Like the scent but don't burn evenly
review: There definitely is a difference parrafin and soy wax. I am an avid candle user and will spend the money on a good candle but was disappointed with the burn. Maybe it needs 2 wicks. I have many Yankee candles and it seems like they have changed their wicks. If you don't trim them they are smokey. I do like their scents though so I end up scraping the sides of wax and put that it a warmer and also when it won't light anymore but there is still wax I put the whole jar in a warmer. For that price I don't want to waste any.

title: Odeur wow
review: Belle grandeur bon odeur!

title: Parfume toute la maisonnée,
review: Bonne odeur de sapin, ideal pour le temps des fêtes

title: Excellent scent
review: Scent is pleasant. Not overpowering.

title: I love the quality and scents that Yankee Candle gives! They last a long time as well!
review: It feels so much more like Christmas when I burn this candle! I love Yankee Candle’

title: Expensive for what it is.
review: Big heavy candle with two wicks but it burns dimly and the scent is weak. Also the coloring of the candle is very dark almost black in colour. I'm disappointed by this Yankee Candle.

title: Love the Christmas Scent
review: Love the fact Yankee Candles burn evenly so not wasting so much wax. I have been burning this candle every day as such a lovely Christmas scent!

title: Great candle!
review: This candle is great all Yankee Candles are top quality with great scents. Have purchase them for years!

title: The candles have a nice scent.
review: Smells great,thank you.❤️Love them a lot.

title: Don't buy
review: Absolutely no scent to this candle. Waste of $$ even on sale.

title: Nice But Too Expensive For What You Get
review: I like all the different Yankee Candles and usually order several for the holiday season, however I think I’ve bought my last ones as even on sale I just can’t justify the cost of these anymore.

title: Received Shattered Glass
review: Candle was delivered with glass shattered inside the box, candle unusable.

title: It seems like a nice candle to burn during the Christmas season.
review: It is the scent of Christmas for me. Waiting to use it in December.

title: Fragrance
review: Like the fragrance, but to expensive .

title: This should never have been sold
review:
I knew there was some damage, but not smashed. Who at Amazon thought this could be resold? Disgusting! I had broken glass all over my counter top. This was dangerous and irresponsible. The jar itself was smashed. No way it was useable. I am very upset. I will never buy a returned item again. I was very lucky not to be cut.
An imperfection, OK. The discount accounts for that. Garbage? Criminal.
Is Amazon too busy now to do things right?

title: Arrived Broken
review: product arrived broken and glass everywhere, resulting in a cut hand.

title: Big fresh smelling candle. Well worth it
review: Turned the basement smell to a more fresh outdoors style smell. Well worth it

title: So mad Awful no scent and wick no return due to me not able to travel to open box
review: Horrible. Didn’t burn cause no wick. Couldn’t send back due to me unable to travel due to Covid regulations tried using as wax melting and no scent. Really upset

review: Nice scent. A bit pricey

title: smells great

title: J'adore

title: Not impressed with smell
review: Barely smelled like its noted to smell. Ended up tossing it out.

title: The scent is amazing
review: Love these candle..they are the best..

title: Not Overwhelmed but OK...
review: The scent was there but while burning, hard to detect, seemed to me. The longevity was pretty much as advertised. I was disappointed with the lack of scent when simply standing unlit too. Just kind of bland. Overall, probably won't buy this one again.

title: A good candle.
review: Been using it pretty often for a couple months and still have more than half left.

title: Best smell
review: Yankee Balsam and cedar is so far the best smelling candle I've ordered on amazon.

title: Odeur +++
review: Fidèle aux Yankee Candle. Odeur parfaite, longévité.

title: I enjoy the calming effect of candles!
review: I enjoyed the candle scents and long lasting burning time!! I enjoy candles as they are calming and soothing to a very hectic work day!!

title: Love the smell!!!
review: Will definitely be buying other scents

title: The smell wasn't what I was expecting
review: Not much scent to it. The candle was a good size though

title: Smells like Christmas time !
review: Very nice and I would by it again. 🙂

title: smells awesome
review: delivered quickly, used for gift

title: Smell good
review: Great candle until you have to try and light it when it gets closer to the bottom and all you have is a lighter. Maybe they should make the glass shorter and wider.

title: Don't waste your money...
review: Bought this as a gift for a friend. It looks very cheap like it was bought at a Dollar Store. My friend advised that it did not have a strong scent. Considering it was an expensive candle, don't waste your money on thus one!

title: Wonderful scent
review: Usually Yankee Candles burn for a long time. This scent burnt very quickly while both the cinnamon & balsam burnt approx 40% longer.

title: Great
review: Candle is wonderful! Smells like Christmas! Lasts for hours (8 to date). Highly recommend!

title: Bonne senteur
review: Bon produit

title: Great candle!
review: Beautiful Christmas tree scent!

title: Not for asthmatics
review: Liked this at first; good scent that is not too strong and slowly builds over about 30 minutes. Doesn't smell unnatural or perfumey. However I became aware after about 3 uses that it badly exacerbates my asthma, which is well controlled.

title: Excellent product
review: I bought this candle for Christmas time. It works perfect. Smell so good. No complaints at all. I would recommend it 100%.

title: Not a strong sent
review: I think this candle is overpriced for what you receive. The traditional glass container is nice, but there is not a strong scent from this candle. I had it burning all day, and each time any guest arrived, they could not really smell the scent. I purchased this brand because I heard good things about them, but honestly I can find much nicer candles with plenty of the natural scent oils. I really hate leaving negative feedback but I wouldn't purchase this brand again.

title: Delicious fragrance
review: Yankee candle always delights

review: Very nice

review: also price too high.

title: No scent
review: Don’t smell it at all was disappointed

title: Great scent.
review: Great scent.

title: SCAM
review:
SCAM.

Doesn’t smell like Christmas. Doesn’t smell
Like anything, actually. Flame smokes even after I trimmed it. No scent of cedar or Forrest. Any review that suggests it does is a fabrication in my view. Will be returning it in the morning.

review: I love this candle. They are a bit pricey but worth it if it is what you want.

review: Its long lasting, and really adds holiday essence to the home.

review: Very disappointed with this candle. There is virtually no scent at all. I wouldn’t recommend this candle.

review: No other scented candle gives an aroma that great.

review: have bought these candles for years. love the smell at this time of year.

title: Not worth the money
review: Smells like shampoo, and you can’t even feel the smell unless you come really close. Ok candle but definitely not worth the money.

review: I love this candle. it smells so nice and just like the Christmas you smell every year.

review: Love it, smells just like a Christmas tree.

review: Great candle- smells like christmas

title: Most fragrant!
review: These are the most fragrant especially around Christmas! Love them!

title: Worth the money
review: Smells great ! The burn time is also great . Good value for money !

title: Christmas season candle
review: The smell of this Christmas season candle is out of this world awesome! We haven’t used it yet, but early. It did arrive with a chip of the glass missing at the top. Hoping we can still use it.

title: Great scent
review: Smells a lot like the pine green smell we look for around Christmas. I use a fake tree every year and burning this candle makes it seem like I have a real Christmas tree in the house!

title: Nice candle
review:
Like longevity
Dislike too non perfume scent

title: Great burn time
review: This candle burns for about 55 hours. The scent is wonderful - not overpowering.

title: Love it
review: Smell fills the whole apartment.

title: Excellent produit

title: I thought that it would be better than Ucalyptu... but
review: Althought Delivery was good, No crush et not hurt, I dont like this smell... I think Ucalyptus would be better...

title: Careful purchasing Candles on line.
review: When I received this candle it looked like it had been melted {not lit) as it was loose inside the jar- when I lit it to burn it, it has No scent. Very disappointing for Yankee.

title: Great choice!
review: I love this smell. I use it in my spa and 1 is enough to fill the entire place.

title: Numéro 1
review: Numéro 1

title: Great Gender Neutral Scent!
review: I bought this candle for my boyfriend and his cousin's apartment. It is a great safe scent to use that anyone would enjoy.

title: No throw.
review: First Yankee Candle. Very disappointed. No throw.

title: not burning evenly, also lots of soot
review:
the candle keeps burning towards one side and the other side never burns, so the surface is not flat.
also lots of soot and flame tends to be super big unless you regularly cut the pick

title: Smell so good and last for long
review: Yankee candle are unique I can’t have a Christmas time without it

title: expensive
review: doese not worth the price, flavour like of the from cheep candles from loony-toony

title: Smells great.
review: After ordering this candle from Hudson’s Bay twice and it being delivered broken, I decided to try to order it from Amazon. Loved it!!! Smells delicious and the product was delivered intact!

title: 5 star service
review: Great candle and fantastic service from this company. Absolutely loves these candles and this company goes above and beyond, excellent service every time!

title: faible odeur
review: malgré deux mèches et un grand pot, l'odeur reste faible en brulant. Décevant !

title: Great smell
review: Very Nice smell. Not overpowered.

title: No scent...dont waste your money here!
review:
Let me start by saying that I have been a yankee candle lover for two decades and have bought more candles than I could ever count....theses DO NOT smell like yankee candles!!!!!
So angry to spend that kind of money on what should be a strong scented candle, only to get a candle with next to zero scent!
I just bought the Christmas Cookie from their store in the states and it smells exactly like it should.

Bottom line: dont waste your money here and by it from the store!

title: Last long.
review: Perfect scent for the holidays.

title: Christmas in a jar!
review: Best fragrance ever!

title: Size is great but doesn't hold the scent
review: Expensive candle that doesn't produce the scent I thought it would. It's very mild.
